text: Same experience as many others. Inquired about sales and was rudely shut down by an overweight Chinese woman at 12pm Wednesday October 23rd. After she whispered something in Mandarin to her associate, and they chuckled with smug delight. AVOID! STAY AWAY! BEWARE!
